Name: iterform
About the game: iterform is a minimalistic hardcore platformer with experimental respawn mechanic. The main feature is the ability to create replicas and respawn on the previous one. What's inside: > 6 colors > more than 45 levels > computer-composed music > about 3 hours of gameplay (about 30 minutes for ultra-pro speedrunners) > linux and windows support > external level editor (python3 script) The game was written in haxe, using openfl framework. The music was composed by music artificial intelligence on jukedeck.
